name: Clarence SUTTON, Appellant v. PENNA. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, and Hon. Kathleen Kane Attorney General Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Sutton v. Penna. Board of Probation & Parol

parties: Clarence SUTTON, Appellant v. PENNA. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, and Hon. Kathleen Kane Attorney General Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of February, 2015, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: James Patrick Barker, PA Office of Attorney General, Harrisburg, for Kathleen Kane.
Jason Anthony Lambrino, PA Bard of Probation and Parole, Harrisburg, PA, for Penna. Board of Probation and Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
110 A.3d 994
Clarence SUTTON, Appellant v. PENNA. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, and Hon. Kathleen Kane Attorney General Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 17, 2015.
Clarence Sutton, Huntingdon, pro se.
James Patrick Barker, PA Office of Attorney General, Harrisburg, for Kathleen Kane.
Jason Anthony Lambrino, PA Bard of Probation and Parole, Harrisburg, PA, for Penna. Board of Probation and Parole.
